title: Bug 17289: Combo doesn't take focus by clicking on it (Photon)
description: Try clicking on the first Combo.
OB: When clicking on the first Combo in Photon, it does not take focus anymore. However, if I drop down the combo list, it will take focus.
SR: To reproduce the issue: Open the 'Add a new CVS Repository' dialog. Press 'Tab' and observe that the focus goes to the second Combo labeled 'Repository Path:'.
